Opinion
Per Curiam,
Order affirmed.

casebody.head_matter:
Hassell, Appellant, v. Board of Elections.
Argued April 30, 1974.
Before Jones, C. J., Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts, Pomeroy, Nix and Manderino, JJ.

Harry Wolov, for appellee.
May 10, 1974:
